TITLE: Superimpose Settings
MSG_0:
Time Information ON/OFF

The swich changes time information display ON/OFF on encoded frame buffer.
MSG_1:
Time Display Position

These radio buttons change to the time information display

position on the encoded frame buffer.

These position radio buttons are disabled by the time information display off.
MSG_2:
GPS Geocoding ON/OFF

The switch changes address information display on encoded frame buffer.

This information is disabled by some iOS device conditions

(Internet disconnection, GPS not working and etc.).
MSG_3:
GPS Geocoding Display Position

These radio buttons change to the GPS geocoding information display

position on the encoded frame buffer.

These position are buttom or top on the encoded frame buffer.
MSG_4:
Background ON/OFF

These information backgrounds are filled to black color by this parameter.
MSG_5:
About These Information Display

The long name address informations are out of

the low resolution on capture frame buffer.
